Reviews.Title: “Fantastic hotel”
Reviews.Author: zonk_69
Reviews.Content: enjoyed short stay hotel perfect price staff extremely friendly clean comfy hotel 30 minutes walk city centre quiet street noise downside hotel thin walls sleep nights buffet breakfast actually nice recommend hotel stay

Reviews.Title: “A week-end stay in a good value hotel in Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: SWINDLES
Reviews.Content: situated circuit clean quiet street breakfast normal menu quality friendly helpful downside bedroom expect price expected shared bathroom none third floor floor watch weekend stay

Reviews.Title: “Great place!”
Reviews.Author: Matthew S
Reviews.Content: stayed quad night stayed near red light district nights wished stayed time nice neighborhood quiet play park children street tram stop nearby definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “If not for the friendly reception and staff, I would stay away”
Reviews.Author: prechiel
Reviews.Content: consider service hotel service oriented staff girl receptionist patient decide receptionist spacious usual carpets chose ground floor building lift doesnt bathroom lot renovation location walk amsterdam heineken museum nearby van gogh museum pls renovate

Reviews.Title: “clean, well located, helpful staff, comfortable beds, good shower”
Reviews.Author: byebaby
Reviews.Content: hotel located little east rijksmuseum easy walking distance plenty restaurants coffee shops near tram stop staff freindly helpful totally clean window securely lovely view onto tree lined courtyard beds comfortable shared bath immaculately clean lots hot water breakfast choice food quality complaints excellent budget hotel definitely book

Reviews.Title: “Recommend it”
Reviews.Author: AussieLady_11
Reviews.Content: budget hotel havent clue travellers talking positive descriptions size solo traveller clean bit annoying traipse downstairs meant cheaper fine lovely sitting breakfats helpful staff definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Very Good Value, Nice”
Reviews.Author: Irena111
Reviews.Content: spend nights amsterdam overseas affordable hotels city staff helpful clean nice breakfast pleasant walking distance major museums canals recommend building lift walk charming narrow winding staircases

Reviews.Title: “Unless you are on a tight budget, don't bother.”
Reviews.Author: Rednut
Reviews.Content: double bed jammed corner shared bathroom creaky noisy wooden floors stairwell steep careful break neck elevator luggage beer fridge drink temperature option location stones throw heineken brewery fun experience otherwise walk ten minute tram ride restaurant red light district

Reviews.Title: “Friendly and close to the sights”
Reviews.Author: Pindsay
Reviews.Content: booked hotel fairly minute fairly central budget pleased quiet little road walking distance sights nice little bars pretty clean lovely breakfast staff helpful email responses kooky little luggage lift clocks hotel various world times recommend hotel close centre hustle

Reviews.Title: “great service”
Reviews.Author: Pirate63
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 trip amsterdam directions tram central station spot service staff reception freindly helpful location excellent walking distance museums attractions tram stops seeing breeze 2 min walk provide routes city basic clean tidy sink provided shared bathroom breakfast included normally breakfast tasty plenty hesitation recommending hotel return amsterdam stay

Reviews.Title: “Clean, well located hotel with good service. Recommended.”
Reviews.Author: pepipox
Reviews.Content: nice hotel located outside city center nice quiet residential walking distance attractions nightlife service people friendly try help whatever albeit clean basic amenities including tv selection channels cleaned daily breakfast ok bad detail traveler commented stairs adjacent building steep dangerous extra careful careful wifi free webpage buy 5 euros card hour able price somewhat expensive reasonable amsterdam location conclusion cheap nofrills located hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good basic, no frills hotel”
Reviews.Author: GracieDundee_UK
Reviews.Content: hotel location outside city centre nice quiet easy walk city tram stops close basic comfortable sleep whilst staying main third floor house ajoining main hotel climb steep flights stairs luggage frankly dangerous breakfast fine basic hot food offer internet access reception cost 50c 10 minutes pay rent safe didnt looking frills cheapish option location dont mind climbing lot stairs

Reviews.Title: “a nice place”
Reviews.Author: sharazade78
Reviews.Content: welcoming pleasant helpful staff clean nice quiet expected basic comfortable ideal looking thats traffic city noise location residential 10 minutes walk city centre
